front.title: •The First Order Was Just The Beginning
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your [Episode VII] troopers are forfeit +1. Once per turn, if [Episode VII] Emperor on table, may deploy Kijimi from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) or place any three cards out of play from your Lost Pile to deploy a non-unique [Episode VII] trooper from Lost Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
